LocaleResource.name: windowSizeLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: Please keep in mind, that values of X and Width should be divisible by 8

LocaleResource.name: bitmapInfoLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: A bitmap for screen should be monochromatic

LocaleResource.name: animatorInfoLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: A gif for screen should be monochromatic

LocaleResource.name: temperatureWarningLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: Please be aware, that if you haven't got a thermometer insde the screen it'll show 0 Celsius degrees or 31 Fahrenheit degrees.

LocaleResource.name: selectSearchButton.Text
LocaleResource.value: I don't know IP, let me search the network

LocaleResource.name: selectConnectButton.Text
LocaleResource.value: I know IP address let me connect directly

LocaleResource.name: localizationInfoLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: Choose language from drop down, write translations and click Generate to create a language file.

LocaleResource.name: controlsToLocalizeGroupBox.Text
LocaleResource.value: List of controls for language file

LocaleResource.name: useSensorInfoLabel.Text
LocaleResource.value: Check "auto" option only if you have a light sensor

LocaleResource.value: The screen was found via network connection. IP is default

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpFoundIpIs
LocaleResource.value: The screen was found via network connection. IP is

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpDefaultNotFound
LocaleResource.value: The screen was not found via network default IP address.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingBySerialStarted
LocaleResource.value: Searching by serial connection has started...

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByCOM
LocaleResource.value: Searching at {0} of {1} ports - {2} with baudrate {3}...

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpUnableToConnect
LocaleResource.value: Could not connect to the screen. Probably given IP was misstyped.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpCanceled
LocaleResource.value: Searching via network connection was canceled.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpFound
LocaleResource.value: Screen was found via network connection.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpNotFound
LocaleResource.value: Screen was not found via network connection.

LocaleResource.value: A screen was found via serial connection.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingBySerialEndedNotFound
LocaleResource.value: Searching by serial connection has ended. Screen was not found.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_searchingByIpAttemptingToConnect
LocaleResource.value: Attempting to connect by given IP...

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_selectNetwork
LocaleResource.value: Please select network to search from.

LocaleResource.name: logMessage_settingTime
LocaleResource.value: Attempting to set time on controller...

LocaleResource.name: messageBoxMessage_connectViaNetwork
LocaleResource.value: Do you want to connect via network?

LocaleResource.name: messageBoxMessage_changeLevelExpert
LocaleResource.value: Expert has access to screen settings, your screen will not work if you do something wrong there. Proceed?

LocaleResource.name: messageBoxMessage_changeLevelBeginner
LocaleResource.value: Beginner has less option, your work will be erased. Proceed?

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_upButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to move up selected program, window or item in playbill hierarchy.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextLeftButton
LocaleResource.value: This button change text align to left.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextItalicButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to change font style to italic.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_progLoadButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to load one of previously saved programs.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_runningDateTimeEnd
LocaleResource.value: The hour and minute when screen will stop playing selected program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_showPreviewButton
LocaleResource.value: This button shows a preview window, which shows how the program would look like on the LED screen.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowWidthTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The width of the window in program It should be divisible by 8.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowYTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The y position of left edge of the window in program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowHeightTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The height of the window in program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextBoldButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to change font style to bold.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_playbillHeightTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The height of LED screen, that will display programs

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_programWidthTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The width of currently selected program must be the same as screen width.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowDivideHorizontalButton
LocaleResource.value: This button divides selected window horizontally into two halves or in other possible proportions.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_languageComboBox
LocaleResource.value: This drop-down list allows to change language used by program simply click on that down arrow and select best option.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_animatorRenderComboBox
LocaleResource.value: This drop-down list allow to set drawing mode for the screen, if it should draw at the center, stretch to fit window, zoom, or create mosaic from small images.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_progSavButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to save your programs to file, so you will be able to load them in the future.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowXTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The x position of left edge of the window in program It should be divisible by 8.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_progressBar1
LocaleResource.value: Progress bar that informs you if there is anything happenning at the moment.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowNameTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The name of currently selected window.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextCenterButton
LocaleResource.value: This button change text align to center.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_addButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to add program, window or item to your playbill New item'll be added depending on selected piece of a tree.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextUnderlineButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to change font style to underline.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_programHeightTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The height of currently selected program must be the same as screen height.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_runningDateTimeBegin
LocaleResource.value: The hour and minute when screen will start displaying selected program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_runningDayscheckedListBox
LocaleResource.value: Program'll be played only at checked days of the week.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_advancedLevelCheckBox
LocaleResource.value: Change application user level to the one with most functions - advanced.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_playbillColorComboBox
LocaleResource.value: The available colors used by LED screen, that will display programs different screens could use different pallets of colours.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_programNameTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The name of currently selected program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_runningCheckBox
LocaleResource.value: If this item is checked, program will be played only at specified days and hours of the week.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmapRenderComboBox
LocaleResource.value: This drop-down list allow to set drawing mode for the screen, if it should draw at the center, stretch to fit window, zoom, or create mosaic from small images.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_bitmaptextRightButton
LocaleResource.value: This button change text align to right.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_windowDivideVerticalButton
LocaleResource.value: This button divides selected window vertically into two halves or in other possible proportions.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_useDeaultsForPlaybillCheckBox
LocaleResource.value: If this item is checked width, height and colors will return to default adjusted to screen which with you recieved this program.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_downButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to move down selected program, window or item in playbill hierarchy.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_deleteButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to delete selected program, window or item from playbill.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_expertLevelCheckBox
LocaleResource.value: Change application user level to the one with access to all settings - expert.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_beginnerLevelCheckBox
LocaleResource.value: Change application user level to the easiest - beginner.

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_playbillWidthTextBox
LocaleResource.value: The width of LED screen, that will display programs

LocaleResource.name: tooltipMessage_showSettingsButton
LocaleResource.value: Press this button to open an advanced network settings window.
